== Atom Categories ==

scheme prefix is: http://daseproject.org/category/

=== feedtype ===
  * collection
  * collection_list
  * search
  * item
  * tag

=== entrytype ===
  * attribute
  * collection
  * item

=== collection ===
  * <collection_ascii_id> | <collection_name>

=== collection/item_count ===
  * <count of items in collection>

=== item/serial_number ===
  * <serial_number>

=== item/status ===
  * public
  * delete
  * draft
=== item/type ===
  * <the item type>

=== place_in_set ===
  * <place (int)>

=== visibility ===
  * public
  * private

=== number_in_set ===
  * <place in set (sort order)>

=== tag/background ===
  * <color or hex code>

=== tag/type ===
  * set
  * slideshow
  * cart
  * admin
  
=== tag_item_id ===
  * <tag_item_id>
